column4: Traffic;Kompong Thom:------ An accident between an express minivan and a motorcycle on September 22
column6: at 7:10 pm on National Road 6 between Kilometer 101-102
column9: Kampong Thom Province left one man seriously injured.------The motorcycle
column10: ridden by a 37 year old farmer from the area (no helmet) was crossing the road
column11: heading west.------The TOYOTA bus of the Virak Buntham was driving from North to South (Siem Reap-Phnom Penh) when it hit the motorcycle.------After the incident
column12: the police took the vehicles away to Tang Kok district
column13: and the injured was taken to hospital. ------POST NEWS
